U

ULTRASONIC_MOTOR_ID - Static variable in class utilities.Settings
The motor id that corresponds to the Ultrasonic motor.
ultrasonicLocalization() - Method in class services.Localization
If the robot started facing the fall the robot will do rising, rising edge detection (angleA, angleB) if the robot started facing the field the robot will do falling edge, rising edge (angleA, angleB)
UltrasonicMotor - Class in hardwareAbstraction
Controls the Ultrasonic motor.

ultrasonicMotor - Variable in class manager.HardwareManager
Handles the ultrasonic motor.
ultrasonicMotor - Static variable in class utilities.Settings
 
UltrasonicPoller - Interface in hardwareAbstraction
This class serves as a higher level abstraction of a ultrasonic sensor.
ultrasonicPoller - Variable in class manager.HardwareManager
Handles interaction with the remote ultrasonic poller.

um - Variable in class manager.Manager
 
update(Point) - Method in class services.Mapper
 
UPDATE_PERIOD - Variable in class hardwareAbstraction.LinePoller
Period to update the sensors and run the detection algorithm.
UPDATE_PERIOD - Variable in class manager.ControllerManager
Update period, default is 50ms
UPDATE_PERIOD - Variable in class services.Localization
Period to check ultrasonic sensor in ms
UPDATE_PERIOD - Variable in class services.Navigation
 
UPDATE_PERIOD - Variable in class services.Odometer
Period to update odometer, in ms
UPDATE_PERIOD - Variable in class services.OdometryCorrection
Period to update, should be similar to update period of LinePoller
updatePosition() - Method in class services.Localization
Updates the odometer's position based on line localization results Uses method similar to lab 5
updateTheta() - Method in class services.Localization
Updates Odometer theta based on the results of ultrasonic sensor localization
updateUltrasonic() - Method in class services.Localization
Calls getUSReading from UltrasonicPoller for the center ultrasonic sensor
